IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: FOSTERING HEALTH AND HEALING WITH FOOD AND COMPASSION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: FOSTERING HEALTH AND HEALING WITH FOOD AND COMPASSION.
IRS990.Desc: FOOD FOR THOUGHT PROVIDES MEDICALLY-TAILORED NUTRITION SERVICES TO PEOPLE FACING FOOD INSECURITY AND SERIOUS ILLNESSES IN SONOMA COUNTY, CA. IN 2022, WE SERVED MORE THAN 5,000 PEOPLE, PROVIDING OVER 330,000 MEALS TO CLIENTS LIVING WITH A VARIETY OF CONDITIONS INCLUDING HIV, CANCER, COVID-19, DIABETES, PREGNANCY, RECOVERING AT HOME AFTER A HOSPITAL ADMISSION, AND HOMELESS WITH A SERIOUS ILLNESS. OUR CLIENTS RECEIVE WEEKLY MEDICALLY-TAILORED MEALS AND GROCERIES, VITAMINS AND SUPPLEMENTS, AND NUTRITION CONSULTATIONS. OUR HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE SERVICE PROVIDES 21 MEALS PER PERSON PER WEEK, AND MEETS MEDICAL NUTRITION NEEDS AS WELL AS ACCOMMODATING A WIDE RANGE OF PERSONAL AND CULTURAL PREFERENCES. IN 2022 OUR THREE LARGEST PROGRAMS WERE: * HIV NUTRITION PROGRAM - SERVES CLIENTS LIVING WITH HIV, PLUS ALL DEPENDENTS

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: * FULL BELL PROGRAM - SERVES PREGNANT CLIENTS FACING FOOD INSECURITY, PLUS ALL HOUSEHOLD MEMBERS, FOR THE DURATION OF THE PREGNANCY AND UP TO THREE MONTHS AFTER THE BIRTH * COVID-19 NUTRITION PROGRAM - SERVES CLIENTS WHO ARE IN QUARANTINE OR ISOLATION DUE TO COVID-19 INFECTION OR EXPOSURE, PLUS ALL HOUSEHOLD MEMBERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO PROVIDE RETURNS THAT WILL SUPPORT THE ORGANIZATION'S OPERATIONS

Generally accepted accounting principles provide accounting and disclosure guidance about positions taken by an organization in its tax returns that might be uncertain. Management has considered its tax positions and believes that all of the positions taken by FFT in their federal and state exempt agency tax returns are more likely than not to be sustained upon examination. FFTs evaluation on December 31, 2022 revealed no tax positions that would have a material impact on the financial statements. Generally, FFTs tax returns remain open for federal income tax examination for three years from the date of filing, and four years for the state of California. FFT classifies income tax related interest and penalties, if any, in interest expense and miscellaneous expenses, respectively.
